Class BaseResource

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.Handler
      org.restlet.resource.Resource
          api.BaseResource
Direct Known Subclasses:
BackupdataResource, FileDownloadResource, FileListResource, LoginResource, SettingsResource, UploadResource
public class BaseResource
extends org.restlet.resource.Resource

Base class to support common functions among the resources, e.g., authentication and authenticated username.

Field Summary
protected  GoogleDocs gdocs
          The object to perform authentication.

Method Detail

authenticate

public boolean authenticate()
Perform authentication. This must be called as the first in sub-class constructor after invoking the base class constructor.

Returns:
true on success and false otherwise.

Get the authenticated username.
